mapper.insert:
insert into base_series
code, long_code, pid, name, is_leaf, level, ordering, pic_id, display_status, first_stage_code, second_stage_code, third_stage_code, fourth_stage_code, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark,
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displayStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstStageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondStageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdStageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fourthStageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT bs.id FROM base_series bs WHERE CODE IN ( SELECT bb.brand_code FROM authorized_config ac LEFT JOIN base_brand bb ON bb.id = ac.brand_ids AND bb.is_deleted = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
